enWisdom: Be sincere and you will attain [success]
Through sincerity, the doers of good deeds contend for excellence

Wisdom: صِدْقُ إِخْلَاصِ الْمَرْءِ يُعْظِمُ زُلْفَتَهُ وَيُجْزِلُ مَثُوبَتَهُ
enWisdom: The true sincerity of a person makes his nearness [to Allah] greater and his reward abundant
When sincerity is achieved the consciences are illuminated
The goal of sincerity is [attaining] deliverance [from the punishment of Allah]

Wisdom: مَنْ أَخْلَصَ النِّيَّةَ تَنَزَّهَ عَنِ الدَّنِيَّةِ
enWisdom: Whoever makes his intention sincere is purified from vileness
One who makes his actions sincere, attains his hopes

Wisdom: أَوَّلُ الْإِخْلَاصِ الْيَأْسُ مِمَّا فِي أَيْدِي النَّاسِ
enWisdom: The beginning of sincerity is losing hope in that which people possess

Wisdom: مَنْ أَخْلَصَ لِلَّهِ اسْتَظْهَرَ لِمَعَاشِهِ وَمَعَادِهِ
enWisdom: One who devotes himself sincerely to Allah gains support for his life in this world and his Hereafter
